# [Interview #988: West Jordan Signing Report - Josh & Mi'ch, Entry #15](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=988#15)

#### Question

If you make a Feruchemical storage and you burn it, can you put the excess back into a Feruchemical storage?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
